channel.title: Help with .class files
channel.description:
I recently made my client closed source so i could release it to people Then i realised i forgot to compile an update to the client, And me being me forgot to save a backup copy of it
Does anyone know a link to a free Java compiler?

item.title: Help with .class files
item.dc:creator: @R4z0rb14d3 R4z0rb14d3
item.description:
@R4z0rb14d3 wrote:

wait, compiler? what about the compiler.bat file that links to your javac?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with .class files
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“lord_fear, post:4, topic:373958”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=469944.msg3436181#msg3436181 date=1292780504]
Why would you delete the java files out of your copy of the client.
[/quote]
For the simple reason of, It being smaller in size…
And so no-one can copy[/quote]

I mean your copy, as in the one on your computer. You should take your finalized client, make a second copy, delete the java files from the second copy, archive it and upload it.

Read full topic
